modName: Killer Keo's College Robes with added physics
summary: This adds Breast physics to the college robes included in killer keo's armour mod for CBBE
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod, that adds breast physics to the college robes (remodelled by killer keo).
The proportions are based on the CBBE Curvy preset as is most of killer keo's armours.Â 

[youtube]rYzGAtsgXmM[/youtube]

For this mod to work you will need:

CBBE (BBP, TBBP, or HDT body type) (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?)
Killer keo's original armour replacer (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/?)
HDT Physics Extensions (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?)
XP32 Maximum Skeleton (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?)
Skyrim Script Extender (skse.silverlock.org)

*Note*
This is my first mod so it will be a bit rough around the edges, however I plan to refine it when I have the time/motivation
author: Leovera
